title: bold
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017170653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017170653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Bold**

A [weight](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017170653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/weight) variation of a typeface which is heavier than the regular (often called [roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017170653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/roman)) weight of a typeface. A bold typeface is often used to emphasize portions of text instead of [italics](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017170653/http:/typophile.com/wiki/italic).
